::: {.question-block}
<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswer('module2_mcq_q35')" data-correct-answer="C">
<strong style="display: block;">Market return = 14%, risk-free rate = 5%, beta of stock = 1.2. According to CAPM, expected return is:</strong>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q35" value="A"> A. 14%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q35" value="B"> B. 15%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q35" value="C"> C. 16%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q35" value="D"> D. 17%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q35" value="E"> E. 18%</label><br>
</form>
<div id="feedback-module2_mcq_q35" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ Correct: C. E(R) = 5% + 1.2×(14−5)% = 16.8% ≈ 16%.
</div>
:::
